field.name: description
field.value:
Allow empty DateTime at server-side validation.
Allow empty value when validating regex at client-side
Client-side email validation was done twice (through SetEmail and SetRegEx). Will use only regular expression now (like server-side validation), this will NOT work for fValidate (has no regex validation). If this is a problem, we'll have to inherit EmailValidator from AbstractValidator, and duplicate the IsValid method from RegularExpressionValidator.
